alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ottawa County through 630 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Grand Haven, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holland... Grand Haven... Hudsonville... Zeeland... Coopersville... Beechwood... Allendale... Jenison... Holland SP... Wright... Port Sheldon... Lamont... Drenthe... Bauer... Grand Valley... Jamestown... Vriesland... Olive Center... Macatawa... West Olive... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
